title: Hand-lettered, flourished typeface
content:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420023418im_/http:/typophile.com/files/gold-black-white-wedding-inspiration-1_3811.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420023418im_/http:/typophile.com/files/gold-black-white-wedding-inspiration-3_3527.jpg)

Found on letterpress invitation suite designed by Aerialist Press: [http://www.100layercake.com/blog/2012/12/19/black-white-gold-new-years-w...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420023418/http:/www.100layercake.com/blog/2012/12/19/black-white-gold-new-years-wedding-ideas/ "http://www.100layercake.com/blog/2012/12/19/black-white-gold-new-years-wedding-ideas/")

I haven't been able to find any information on the script font - I'm beginning to wonder if it was done as a one-time project. Any help would be greatly appreciated!

Font: 

 Conspired Lovers
author: acdeloia
